metadata.title: NextEleven Studios & Blue9.0 Knowledge Base
metadata.description: Comprehensive knowledge base for NextEleven Studios and Blue9.0 enterprise AI platform

knowledge_base.question: Who is the CEO of NextEleven Studios?
knowledge_base.answer: The CEO of NextEleven is Sean F. McDonnell, who also serves as Founder, Designer, and Developer.

knowledge_base.question: What is Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 is the latest enterprise AI platform developed by NextEleven, designed for advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and AI chatbot implementations.

knowledge_base.question: What roles does Sean F. McDonnell hold in Blue9.0 development?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell is the CEO, Founder, Designer, and Developer of Blue9.0, overseeing its architecture, design, and deployment.

knowledge_base.question: What is a RAG engine in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: The RAG engine in Blue9.0 is a proprietary system that integrates retrieved information into AI-generated responses, allowing contextually accurate and up-to-date answers.

knowledge_base.question: How customizable is Blue9.0's RAG engine?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0's RAG engine is highly customizable, supporting multiple data sources, adjustable retrieval algorithms, and user-defined prompt templates.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 integrate with other platforms?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can integrate with CRM systems like HubSpot and Salesforce, email, web chat, and other APIs through its flexible integration layer.

knowledge_base.question: What analytics features does Blue9.0 provide?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 provides analytics features including query counts, sentiment analysis, performance metrics, and detailed usage dashboards.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support multi-modal inputs?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 supports text-based inputs and can be configured for multi-modal inputs depending on the deployment and integration setup.

knowledge_base.question: How secure is Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 implements metadata tagging, error handling, and optional sentiment validation, ensuring data security and accuracy.

knowledge_base.question: What support options are available for Blue9.0 users?
knowledge_base.answer: Support varies by package: basic email support, ticketing with 12-hour responses, or priority multi-channel support depending on the subscription tier.

knowledge_base.question: Who can use Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 is designed for solopreneurs, small retailers, mid-sized e-commerce businesses, and enterprise clients depending on the subscription package.

knowledge_base.question: What is the entry-level package for Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: The entry-level package, called Zest, is for solopreneurs and small retailers, offering 1 bot, 1,000 queries per month, standard RAG, email/web chat integration, and basic analytics.

knowledge_base.question: What is the price of the Zest package?
knowledge_base.answer: The Zest package costs $19 per month or $190 per year.

knowledge_base.question: What is the Vibe package in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: The Vibe package targets growing businesses and mid-sized e-commerce, offering 2 bots, 5,000 queries per month, advanced RAG modes, CRM integration, and sentiment analysis.

knowledge_base.question: What is the price of the Vibe package?
knowledge_base.answer: The Vibe package costs $59 per month or $590 per year.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 be deployed on-premises?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports local, cloud, and hybrid deployments, depending on customer requirements.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 provide real-time analytics?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 provides real-time dashboards showing query usage, bot performance, and engagement metrics.

knowledge_base.question: What frontends can Blue9.0 integrate with?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 can be embedded in web applications using iframes, React, Streamlit, or API integrations for custom frontends.

knowledge_base.question: Can I test Blue9.0 locally?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, you can run Blue9.0 on port 8000 locally and connect a frontend (e.g., React on port 3000) to test integration.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support hybrid deployment?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, hybrid deployment allows parts of Blue9.0 to run locally while other components run in the cloud, providing flexibility and security.

knowledge_base.question: Who is responsible for design decisions in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell leads design decisions as the Designer, ensuring cohesive UI/UX and brand consistency.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 provide automated RAG updates?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can fetch updated knowledge from connected sources automatically and integrate it into responses.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 integrate with multiple data sources simultaneously?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports multiple data sources for RAG, including CSV, databases, APIs, and web scraping endpoints.

knowledge_base.question: What is the maximum number of bots supported in enterprise packages?
knowledge_base.answer: Enterprise packages can support unlimited bots depending on the subscription and deployment scale.

knowledge_base.question: How are RAG responses generated in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: RAG responses are generated by combining retrieved context from connected data sources with AI-generated text to produce accurate and contextual answers.

knowledge_base.question: Can I customize prompts in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, prompts and templates can be fully customized for specific workflows, industries, or business goals.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 have streaming capabilities?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can stream responses in real-time to frontends via WebSocket or API streaming endpoints.

knowledge_base.question: What is the Kryon package in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Kryon is an advanced enterprise package offering unlimited bots, high query limits, multi-modal support, advanced analytics, and priority support.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 handle multi-lingual queries?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports multi-lingual queries depending on language model configuration and deployment.

knowledge_base.question: Is there a sandbox mode for Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, developers can use sandbox mode to safely test integrations, bots, and RAG configurations before production.

knowledge_base.question: Who is responsible for development in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell leads development as the primary Developer, overseeing code architecture, system integrations, and deployment pipelines.

knowledge_base.question: What security measures are included in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 includes metadata tagging, error handling, role-based access, optional sentiment validation, and secure API authentication.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 have ticketing support?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, depending on the package, Blue9.0 offers ticketing support with response SLAs, including 12-hour responses for mid-tier packages.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 integrate with email systems?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports email integrations for notifications, queries, and workflow automation.

knowledge_base.question: Can I deploy Blue9.0 on my own server?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports self-hosted deployments for clients who require full control over their infrastructure.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support web chat integrations?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can integrate web chat widgets into websites for direct user interaction with AI bots.

knowledge_base.question: What deployment options are available for Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 can be deployed locally, in the cloud, or in a hybrid configuration depending on the client's requirements.

knowledge_base.question: How does Blue9.0 handle error handling?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 includes comprehensive error handling, logging, and fallback responses to maintain system stability.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 provide sentiment analysis?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, sentiment analysis is included in certain packages, allowing evaluation of user query tone and intent.

knowledge_base.question: Is metadata tagging supported in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports metadata tagging for knowledge sources and RAG responses to improve retrieval accuracy.

knowledge_base.question: Who can access Blue9.0 analytics?
knowledge_base.answer: Analytics dashboards are available to package subscribers and can be customized for role-based access.

knowledge_base.question: How often does Blue9.0 update its knowledge base?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 can be configured to automatically refresh knowledge from connected sources in real-time or scheduled intervals.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support third-party APIs?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can integrate with a variety of third-party APIs for CRM, analytics, and custom business logic.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 generate custom reports?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, users can generate detailed reports on bot performance, query trends, and user interactions.

knowledge_base.question: Are there pre-configured templates in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 provides pre-configured prompt templates that can be customized to specific business workflows.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 handle high query volumes?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, enterprise packages are designed to handle high volumes of queries with performance scaling.

knowledge_base.question: Is Blue9.0 mobile-friendly?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 interfaces and embeds are fully responsive and mobile-optimized.

knowledge_base.question: Can I customize the UI for Blue9.0 chat?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, the chat interface can be customized using React components or frontend templates.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 provide real-time updates?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, both bot responses and analytics dashboards can be streamed in real-time.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 integrate with Nginx reverse proxy?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can be deployed behind an Nginx reverse proxy to manage multiple domains and ports.

knowledge_base.question: What programming languages are used in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 primarily uses Python for backend development and React/JavaScript for frontend integrations.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support hybrid AI deployment?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports hybrid AI deployment with components running locally and in the cloud.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 be used for internal knowledge management?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can be deployed internally to provide AI-assisted knowledge retrieval within an organization.

knowledge_base.question: Who oversees the design of Blue9.0's user experience?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell oversees the UI/UX design, ensuring consistent, intuitive, and visually appealing interfaces.

knowledge_base.question: Is there a free trial for Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, select packages can offer trial periods for evaluation before subscribing.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support sentiment validation?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, advanced packages include sentiment validation to ensure AI responses match intended emotional tone.

knowledge_base.question: Can I embed Blue9.0 chat in multiple websites?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, the chat can be embedded on multiple websites using iframe or API integration.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 have version control for knowledge bases?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 maintains versioning for all connected knowledge bases to track updates and changes.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 handle multi-tenant setups?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, enterprise clients can configure Blue9.0 for multi-tenant environments with isolated data sets.

knowledge_base.question: What is the Jynx package?
knowledge_base.answer: Jynx is a mid-tier package providing enhanced RAG features, multiple bots, and intermediate analytics for growing businesses. The Jynx package costs $299 per month.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 log user interactions?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 logs all queries, responses, and session metrics for auditing and analysis.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 have role-based access control?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports role-based access to control which users can view or edit data and analytics.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 send notifications via email?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can send alerts, query summaries, and workflow notifications via email integration.

knowledge_base.question: Can I schedule knowledge refreshes in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, you can schedule automated refreshes for connected knowledge sources at configurable intervals.

knowledge_base.question: What is the Rush package?
knowledge_base.answer: Rush is a high-tier package providing advanced RAG modes, multiple bots, analytics dashboards, and priority support. The Rush package costs $129 per month.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 integrate with Slack or Teams?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can be configured to integrate with collaboration tools like Slack or Microsoft Teams.

knowledge_base.question: Is Blue9.0 cloud-compatible?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can run on cloud infrastructure for scalability and high availability.

knowledge_base.question: Can I customize the appearance of Blue9.0 chat widget?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, the widget's colors, fonts, and branding can be customized to match your website or product theme.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 offer API access for bots?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, all packages include API endpoints to programmatically interact with AI bots.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 track usage per bot?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, analytics dashboards provide bot-specific usage metrics including queries, response time, and engagement.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 allow prompt versioning?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, prompts and templates can be versioned to manage changes over time and roll back if needed.

knowledge_base.question: What security protocols does Blue9.0 support?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 supports HTTPS, token-based authentication, role-based access control, and optional metadata tagging for secure operations.

knowledge_base.question: Can I deploy Blue9.0 on multiple servers?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 supports distributed deployments for high availability and load balancing.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 provide logs for debugging?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, detailed logs are available for debugging queries, API calls, and system performance.

knowledge_base.question: Is Blue9.0 optimized for speed?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 is optimized for fast query retrieval, low-latency responses, and efficient data processing.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 offer usage limits per package?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, each package defines bot count, monthly queries, and feature access limits.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 provide recommendations based on analytics?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 can generate recommendations for workflow improvements and knowledge base updates.

knowledge_base.question: Is Blue9.0 suitable for enterprise clients?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 includes enterprise-grade features such as multi-bot support, RAG customization, analytics, and security compliance.

knowledge_base.question: Who manages development sprints in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell oversees development sprints, prioritizing features and ensuring timely releases.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 allow API key management?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, API keys can be generated, revoked, and scoped to specific bots or users for security.

knowledge_base.question: Can I use Blue9.0 for customer support automation?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, Blue9.0 is suitable for customer support chatbots, ticket handling, and workflow automation.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support analytics export?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, dashboards can export metrics in CSV or JSON formats for reporting or analysis.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 handle multiple languages simultaneously?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, depending on configuration, Blue9.0 can support multi-lingual interactions concurrently.

knowledge_base.question: Is there a dedicated support team for enterprise Blue9.0 packages?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, higher-tier packages include priority support with dedicated personnel.

knowledge_base.question: Can Blue9.0 be embedded in mobile apps?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, the chat can be embedded via API or webview into mobile applications.

knowledge_base.question: Does Blue9.0 support testing in development environments?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, sandbox and staging environments are supported for safe testing before production deployment.

knowledge_base.question: How are features updated in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Features are updated through release cycles overseen by Sean F. McDonnell, including new analytics, RAG improvements, and integrations.

knowledge_base.question: What are all the pricing tiers for Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 offers 6 pricing tiers: Zest ($19/mo), Vibe ($59/mo), Rush ($129/mo), Jynx ($299/mo), Zynix ($599/mo), and Kryon ($999/mo). Each tier includes different features, query limits, and support levels.

knowledge_base.question: Who is Sean F. McDonnell?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean F. McDonnell is the CEO, Founder, Designer, and Developer of NextEleven and the Blue9.0 platform. He oversees all aspects of the company including strategic direction, technical development, and design.

knowledge_base.question: What support levels are available in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 offers 6 support levels: Email (24h), Email+Ticket (12h), Email+Ticket+Chat (8h), Priority Chat (4h), Phone Support (2h), and Dedicated AM (24/7, 1h). Support level depends on your subscription tier.

knowledge_base.question: What is Email support in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Email support provides basic assistance via email with 24-hour response time. It's available for Zest tier customers and includes access to documentation and FAQ resources.

knowledge_base.question: What is Ticket support in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Ticket support provides structured issue tracking and resolution through a ticketing system. It's available for Vibe tier and above, with 12-hour response time and priority queue access.

knowledge_base.question: What is Chat support in Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: Chat support provides real-time assistance through live chat with screen sharing capabilities. It's available for Rush tier and above, with 8-hour response time and dedicated chat agents.

knowledge_base.question: Who is Sean McDonnell?
knowledge_base.answer: Sean McDonnell (Sean F. McDonnell) is the CEO, Founder, Designer, and Developer of NextEleven. He leads the development of Blue9.0 and oversees all company operations.

knowledge_base.question: How can I get help with Blue9.0?
knowledge_base.answer: You can get help with Blue9.0 through multiple channels: email support, ticketing system, live chat, phone support, or dedicated account manager, depending on your subscription tier. All support channels provide access to documentation and training resources.

knowledge_base.question: What assistance is available for Blue9.0 users?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 provides comprehensive assistance including technical support, training programs, documentation, video tutorials, community forums, and dedicated account management for enterprise customers.

knowledge_base.question: What is the purpose of the NextEleven backend?
knowledge_base.answer: The backend handles queries, enforces tier limits, tracks pilot/demo usage, manages upgrades/downgrades, monitors overages, logs requests, and integrates with the RAG engine for AI responses.

knowledge_base.question: Which framework is used for the backend?
knowledge_base.answer: FastAPI is used for REST endpoints, async handling, and high concurrency support.

knowledge_base.question: How are user tiers defined?
knowledge_base.answer: Tiers are defined from Zest â†’ Kryon with specific monthly query limits, pilot/demo allowances, support levels, and pricing.

knowledge_base.question: How is query usage tracked?
knowledge_base.answer: Query usage is tracked using in-memory dicts, Redis, or SQLite for persistent storage; counts reset each billing cycle.

knowledge_base.question: What happens when query limits are reached?
knowledge_base.answer: Users receive an HTTP 429 error indicating the limit is reached and may upgrade or pay overage fees.

knowledge_base.question: How is the RAG engine integrated?
knowledge_base.answer: A placeholder function 'run_rag(query)' exists; it can be replaced with Blue9.0 RAG engine in production.

knowledge_base.question: How are pilot/demo users identified?
knowledge_base.answer: Pilot/demo users are flagged with 'is_pilot': True and have limited query allowances.

knowledge_base.question: Can the backend handle concurrent queries?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, FastAPI's async functions enable handling multiple simultaneous requests efficiently.

knowledge_base.question: How are upgrades and downgrades handled?
knowledge_base.answer: Upgrades are applied immediately via async functions, while downgrades are scheduled at the end of the billing cycle with credit applied.

knowledge_base.question: How is billing proration calculated?
knowledge_base.answer: Proration uses the formula: (new_tier_price - current_tier_price) * (days_left / 30).

knowledge_base.question: How is the frontend made responsive?
knowledge_base.answer: Using CSS media queries, horizontal scroll wrappers, and mobile-friendly table styling.

knowledge_base.question: Are downloadable PDFs available?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, PDFs of tier tables can be generated for marketing or client download.

knowledge_base.question: How are pilot/demo trials managed in the frontend?
knowledge_base.answer: Frontend buttons link to pilot endpoints and show remaining queries or trial duration dynamically.

knowledge_base.question: What anti-abuse mechanisms exist for pilots?
knowledge_base.answer: CAPTCHA, IP throttling, and query caps are implemented to prevent abuse.

knowledge_base.question: How are onboarding tutorials delivered?
knowledge_base.answer: Onboarding tutorials are provided in markdown or HTML format for self-serve pilot users.

knowledge_base.question: How are upgrades/downgrades communicated to users?
knowledge_base.answer: Users receive notifications of feature changes, credit applications, and upcoming downgrades.

knowledge_base.question: What are the support tiers?
knowledge_base.answer: Zest: Email, Vibe: Email+Ticket, Rush: Email+Ticket+Chat, Jynx: Priority Chat, Zynix: Phone Support, Kryon: Dedicated Account Manager 24/7.

knowledge_base.question: How are escalations managed?
knowledge_base.answer: Escalation follows Email â†’ Ticket â†’ Chat â†’ Priority â†’ Phone â†’ Dedicated Account Manager depending on tier.

knowledge_base.question: Are SLA targets defined?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, each support tier has recommended response times and escalation procedures.

knowledge_base.question: How is NextEleven positioned for DFW clients?
knowledge_base.answer: Marketing emphasizes 'Built in DFW for DFW businesses', highlighting local pilot offers and discounts.

knowledge_base.question: What industries are highlighted in marketing?
knowledge_base.answer: Retail, healthcare, and agencies, each mapped to the appropriate tier packages.

knowledge_base.question: Are SEO recommendations provided?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, taglines like 'Zest â†’ Kryon: DFW-Powered, World-Class AI' are suggested.

knowledge_base.question: What is included in the custom enterprise buyout?
knowledge_base.answer: One-time $1.2M licensing, full source code & IP transfer, unlimited bots & queries, dedicated account manager, 24/7 support, 30-day POC, and optional phased payments.

knowledge_base.question: Can enterprise clients request custom tier configurations?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, clients can define custom queries, bot counts, features, and pilot durations.

knowledge_base.question: Are ROI projections provided in enterprise buyouts?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, phased payment plans and ROI calculations are included to guide investment decisions.

knowledge_base.question: Are proactive monitoring tools included?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, endpoints such as /health and /metrics provide proactive system alerts.

knowledge_base.question: Can pilot/demo queries be adjusted?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, limits can be configured per tier or adjusted per enterprise client during pilot setup.

knowledge_base.question: How are support scripts organized?
knowledge_base.answer: Call scripts and email templates are organized by tier to ensure consistent responses.

knowledge_base.question: Can frontend highlight promotional campaigns?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, dynamic badges and tooltips can show seasonal offers, local DFW discounts, and trial periods.

knowledge_base.question: How is billing integrated with FastAPI?
knowledge_base.answer: Async functions communicate with Stripe or other billing services to process proration and payments.

knowledge_base.question: Are historical usage reports available?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, usage data is logged and can be queried for reporting, dashboards, and auditing.

knowledge_base.question: Can admins view pilot usage statistics?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, dashboards can display usage metrics, query counts, and pilot conversion rates.

knowledge_base.question: What is the official company name?
knowledge_base.answer: The official company name is NextEleven.

knowledge_base.question: When was NextEleven founded?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven was founded in 2023.

knowledge_base.question: Where is NextEleven headquartered?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven was founded in 2023.

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's website?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's official website is https://www.nexteleven.ai

knowledge_base.question: What industry does NextEleven operate in?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven operates in Artificial Intelligence, SaaS, and Enterprise AI Solutions.

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's mission?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's mission is to empower DFW businesses with world-class AI chatbots and automation solutions.

knowledge_base.question: What are NextEleven's core values?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's core values are Innovation, Reliability, Customer-Centric, and Scalable AI.

knowledge_base.question: What is the official product name?
knowledge_base.answer: The official product name is NextEleven AI Chatbot.

knowledge_base.question: What type of AI system is the NextEleven AI Chatbot?
knowledge_base.answer: The NextEleven AI Chatbot is a RAG-powered AI Chatbot.

knowledge_base.question: What are all the available product tiers?
knowledge_base.answer: The available product tiers are Zest, Vibe, Rush, Jynx, Zynix, and Kryon.

knowledge_base.question: What are the key product features?
knowledge_base.answer: Key product features include tiered query limits, pilot/demo flows, upgrade/downgrade management, overage tracking, custom enterprise buyout, async handling, and usage monitoring.

knowledge_base.question: What backend technology is used?
knowledge_base.answer: The backend uses FastAPI + Redis/SQLite, with async query handling, Pydantic models, and RAG stub integration.

knowledge_base.question: What frontend technology is used?
knowledge_base.answer: The frontend uses HTML/CSS/JS responsive tables, PDF downloads, DFW branding, dynamic tooltips, and mobile-first design.

knowledge_base.question: What AI engine powers the chatbot?
knowledge_base.answer: The chatbot is powered by the Blue9.0 RAG engine (stubbed for local testing).

knowledge_base.question: What support system is available?
knowledge_base.answer: The support system includes tiered support from Email to Dedicated AM, with SLA targets and escalation workflows.

knowledge_base.question: What backend technologies are used?
knowledge_base.answer: Backend technologies include FastAPI, Python 3.9+, SQLite/Redis, async processing, and Pydantic models.

knowledge_base.question: What frontend technologies are used?
knowledge_base.answer: Frontend technologies include HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, with optional Bootstrap/Tailwind.

knowledge_base.question: What AI technologies are used?
knowledge_base.answer: AI technologies include RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and the Blue9.0 engine.

knowledge_base.question: What billing technologies are integrated?
knowledge_base.answer: Billing technologies include Stripe integration, proration support, and async upgrade/downgrade handling.

knowledge_base.question: What deployment technologies are used?
knowledge_base.answer: Deployment technologies include Uvicorn server, cloud-ready architecture, and local-first DFW deployment.

knowledge_base.question: Who is the target audience?
knowledge_base.answer: The target audience includes DFW businesses, enterprise clients, retail, healthcare, and agencies.

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's unique value proposition?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's unique value proposition is DFW-first AI solutions with global-grade capabilities.

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's official tagline?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's official tagline is 'From Zest to Kryon: DFW-Powered, World-Class AI'.

knowledge_base.question: Does NextEleven offer local pilot programs?
knowledge_base.answer: Yes, NextEleven offers local pilot programs for DFW businesses.

knowledge_base.question: What is included in the enterprise buyout package?
knowledge_base.answer: The enterprise buyout package includes $1.2M one-time license + annual $50k-$100k, 30-day POC, full IP & source code, dedicated AM, and unlimited bots & queries.

knowledge_base.question: What is the sales email address?
knowledge_base.answer: The sales email address is sales@nexteleven.ai.

knowledge_base.question: What is the support email address?
knowledge_base.answer: The support email address is support@nexteleven.ai

knowledge_base.question: What is the company phone number?
knowledge_base.answer: The company phone number is +1-214-555-1234

knowledge_base.question: What social media platforms does NextEleven use?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven uses LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube, and GitHub for social media presence.

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's LinkedIn URL?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's LinkedIn URL is https://www.linkedin.com/company/nexteleven

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's Twitter handle?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's Twitter URL is https://twitter.com/nexteleven_ai

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's YouTube channel?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's YouTube URL is https://www.youtube.com/nexteleven

knowledge_base.question: What is NextEleven's GitHub repository?
knowledge_base.answer: NextEleven's GitHub URL is https://github.com/nexteleven

knowledge_base.question: What privacy features does Blue9.0 provide?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 provides comprehensive privacy features including data encryption, secure storage, GDPR compliance, and user data protection.

knowledge_base.question: What core functionality does Blue9.0 offer?
knowledge_base.answer: Blue9.0 offers core functionality including RAG-powered responses, multi-modal processing, real-time chat, analytics, and customizable AI agents.
